homePage.statement:
The Digital Imaging and Preservation Services (DI&PS) unit of the Information Technology Services (ITS) department within the University Libraries at Virginia Tech serves as a one-stop digital projects center for the arts, sciences, cultural and historical heritage materials of Virginia Tech, Appalachia, and the state of Virginia since 2016.  See our About section for more information.

The DI&PS team preserves, protects, and provides access to the collections by digitizing, preserving, and providing access to digital assets from both Virginia Tech and from the Southwest Virginia region.

This temporary digital library is to serve as a portal site to increase the visibility of the partners' collections and to provide access to unique digital content. This site is open to the public with educational use rights.

This digital library holds featured collections under Exhibits, while the other items can be found in Browse Items or Browse Collections.

aboutCopy:
This portal site is created and administered by the Digital Imaging team from Digital Imaging and Preservation Services (DI&PS) to host cultural and historical heritage materials of Virginia Tech and the state of Virginia. Digitization projects within this scope have been ongoing since 2016, which also led to the creation of the DI&PS team.

University Libraries at Virginia Tech is currently building a new digital library infrastructure. This portal site is a temporary platform to host our growing digital collections and is also an ongoing project itself. In addition to this portal site, we have revised our Selection Scope policy, developed a documentation wiki for DI&PS , and created new workflows to address incoming content from our partners. Information on DI&PS team and technical standards are found below.

Interested in getting your unique collection digitized, accessible on this site, and disseminated through nationwide digital project via DPLA Get Started Today!

DI&PS Team Members And Technical Details

  • People
  • Imaging Standards
  • Metadata
  • Digital Preservation

Our Partners

Our partners are from within Virginia Tech campus and small regional institutions such as museums, archives, theaters, churches, and historical societies.
